00026 typedef struct {
00027   int number;
00028   double time;
00029   /* Data stored in columns since this is how the frames are sliced
00030    Data stored as floats. */
00031   int width, height;
00032   int allocated;  /* Indicates whether data has been allocated */
00033   
00034   float **data;
00035 
00036   int last; /* Flag indicating last frame */
00037 }TFrame;
00038 
00039 typedef struct {
00040   int bpp;
00041   int rowbytes;
00042   int channels; /* Number of channels - 1 for greyscale */
00043   int allocated;
00044 
00045   int width, height;
00046 
00047   unsigned char **data; /* Raw data. Stored in rows. */
00048 }TRawFrame;

00050 /* Color map definition */
00051 typedef struct {
00052   int n;
00053   float *value; /* Value between 0 and 1. Sorted by value */

00055   float *green;
00056   float *blue;
00057 }TColorMap;

00059 typedef struct {
00060   int width; /* Width of filter in pixels */
00061   int height; /* Height of filter in pixels */
00062   int x, y; /* Centre of filter (where result goes) */
00063   int normalize; /* if 1, normalize result to weights applied */
00064   float **weight; /* Weights */
00065 }FILTER;
